text: Lahiru Jayaratne (born 12 October 1991) is a Sri Lankan cricketer. He made his first-class debut for Ragama Cricket Club in the 2011–12 Premier Trophy on 4 March 2012. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:Kurunegala Youth Cricket Club cricketers Category:Ragama Cricket Club cricketers Category:People from Central Province, Sri Lanka
title: Lahiru Jayaratne
